code: import*as actionTypes from"./actionTypes";import{sortMessages}from"./index";export var addFilter=function addFilter(filter,name,filtered,sort){return function(dispatch){try{dispatch(filterMessagesStart());dispatch(filterMessagesAdd(filter,name));dispatch(filterMessages());if(sort){dispatch(sortMessages(filtered));}}catch(err){dispatch(filterMessagesFail(err));}};};export var removeFilter=function removeFilter(filter,name,filtered,sort){return function(dispatch){try{dispatch(filterMessagesStart());dispatch(filterMessagesRemove(filter,name));dispatch(filterMessages());if(sort){dispatch(sortMessages(filtered));}}catch(err){dispatch(filterMessagesFail(err));}};};export var filterMessagesAdd=function filterMessagesAdd(filter,name){return{type:actionTypes.FILTER_MESSAGES_ADD,filter:filter,name:name};};export var filterMessagesRemove=function filterMessagesRemove(filter,name){return{type:actionTypes.FILTER_MESSAGES_REMOVE,filter:filter,name:name};};export var filterMessages=function filterMessages(){return{type:actionTypes.FILTER_MESSAGES};};export var filterMessagesStart=function filterMessagesStart(){return{type:actionTypes.FILTER_MESSAGES_START};};export var filterMessagesFail=function filterMessagesFail(error){return{type:actionTypes.FILTER_MESSAGES_FAIL,error:error};};export var filterReset=function filterReset(){return{type:actionTypes.FILTER_RESET};};
